column5: Just got this in an email from a good friend, thought I'd post for all. Apparently it's hanging in a Canadian bar somewhere.
So Very True.   That's just awesome.
My wife saw this on the screen and I am now getting "The Look"
i posted this on floatfishing.net i hope you dont mind...... i found this sooo funny but yet soo true thanks bigredfisher
haha. good one. where can i get one of those wall displays? Or was it handmade by someone?
Don't know who wrote it except that he signed it Larry.  Wonder if it's Larry from Vermont, you know the guy, has 2 brothers, his brother Daryl and his other brother Daryl.
I wonder if you can take a quick pic and post them on the internet for C&R
